suggestedNewContent.title: Common Setup Problems
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Cover common issues: Flutter SDK not in PATH, extension not finding SDK, Android SDK license issues, outdated Java version. Include specific error messages and solutions.

suggestedNewContent.title: Alternative: Android Studio
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Brief overview of Android Studio as alternative IDE. When to choose Android Studio vs VS Code (more integrated Android tooling, built-in emulator management). How to install Flutter plugin in Android Studio.

suggestedNewContent.title: Essential Additional Extensions
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Recommend: Awesome Flutter Snippets (code snippets), Error Lens (inline error display), Pubspec Assist (dependency management), Flutter Tree (widget visualization). Brief description of each.

suggestedNewContent.title: Debugging Setup
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: How to set breakpoints (click line number gutter), start debugging (F5 or Run menu), use debug console, view variables. Introduction to Flutter DevTools from VS Code.

suggestedNewContent.title: Verify Your Setup
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Step-by-step verification: 1) Run flutter doctor in VS Code terminal, 2) Create test project with Flutter: New Project, 3) Run the app with F5, 4) See the default counter app running. Include expected output.

suggestedNewContent.title: Flutter DevTools
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Explain DevTools is built into Flutter SDK. How to open from VS Code: Command Palette > Open DevTools. Key tools: Widget Inspector, Performance view, Network tab.
